name: ca65-vscode-extension
description: CA65 Assembly language support for VS Code
author: Quang Luong

ca65.enableCa65StdErrDiagnostics.description: Enables diagnostics powered by ca65 stderr.

ca65.executablePath.description: The full path to the ca65 compiler executable. If this is not provided, the ca65 in the system PATH will be used

ca65.includeDirs.description: A list of workspace-relative wildcard-compatible paths to search for `.include` statements after the current file's directory. This should match any '-I' options of your ca65 build step.

ca65.binIncludeDirs.description: A list of workspace-relative paths to search for `.incbin` statements after the current file's directory. This should match any '--bin-include-dir' options of your ca65 build step.

ca65.autoIncludeExtensions.description: A list of extensions for which we will provide auto-include candidates for.

ca65.anonymousLabelIndexHints.description: Enables inlay hints for anonymous label indexes.

ca65.importFromHints.description: Enables inlay hints for display the origin file of an import.

ca65.additionalExtensions.description: A list of extensions (e.g. `.i`, `.mac`) for which we will index for in addition to the default `.s`, `.asm`, and `.inc` (and any `file.associations` set to `ca65`). This is intended for users of the standalone LSP using other editors that do not have VSCode's `file.associations`.

ca65.smartFolding.description: Enables smart folding based on scopes, procs, and other blocks. Disable to use the editor's default folding.

commands.title: ca65: Dump Performance Stats to Output
ca65: Dump Symbol Tables to Output
ca65: Dump Includes Graph to Output
ca65: Dump Exports Map to Output

scripts.package-lsp: npm run package-lsp:linux && npm run package-lsp:win && npm run package-lsp:macos
scripts.package-lsp:linux: npm run compile && pkg --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/bin/ca65-lsp-linux server/out/server.js
scripts.package-lsp:win: npm run compile && pkg --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/bin/ca65-lsp-win.exe server/out/server.js
scripts.package-lsp:macos: npm run compile && pkg --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/bin/ca65-lsp-macos server/out/server.js
